title: functionality Shamoon
extract: An attacker launches Shamoon on a network. The virus spreads to the hard disks of other computers in the network by means of a function called "dropper." The virus compiles lists of files on each infected computer. ... A function called "wiper" erases some or all of the compromised files.
extract_html: An attacker launches Shamoon on a network. The virus spreads to the hard disks of other computers in the network by means of a function called "dropper." The virus compiles lists of files on each infected computer. ... A function called "wiper" erases some or all of the compromised files.
